author: Stereogum
title: Preview A New Phoenix Song In Tour Announcement Video
text: Before this morning, it had been more than a year since French smooth-rock kings Phoenix had updated any of their various social media feeds. But this morning, those sites crackled back to life with an announcement of a few live shows and 30 seconds of brand-new music. What we hear in that tour-announcement video (if … More »
